website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set of Care Bear squirting toys that are great for bath time.
pros: Includes Cheer Bear, Share Bear, and Grumpy Bear
Squirters are larger than many other similar toys and are good quality
Great for playing during bath time
cons: Like all squirter toys, it's important to get all water out to prevent mold

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable and a great size
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and a great size. As actual bath squirters, they are difficult to fill and only squirt well when quite filled. Holes in mouth point in different directions so not just a point and shoot type of squirter either. My 2 1/2 year old is a huge Care Bears fan so we aren't that disappointed in these. The size is great as they are much larger than the standard figures making them fun for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: SonMoonsMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! My baby loves them. I was surprised how big they are! When I ordered them I thought they would be some cheap little bath toys, But they are actually a pretty good size and they look great! I have seen other care bears products on here that look like they been traumatized (Crappy paint job) But these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Toner

customer_reviews.title: Great size and color
customer_reviews.text: They are a very good size. We used them as cake toppers since there is not much “care bear” themed party decor to choose from at stores . Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: haydy

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for bath time for my daughter! They are fun because the squirt water with the vibrant colors. They are good quality. For my daughter’s birthday they were used on top of her Care Bear cake she loved the cake and they were perfect for playing with after.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyna King

customer_reviews.title: These were a HUGE hit with our daughter for bath time.
customer_reviews.text: These were a HUGE hit with our daughter. She loves playing with them in the bath. The size is perfect not to get lost in the tub and the detail on the toys are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and durable. Just make sure you pay attention to the size, because I didn't! I was going to use them on a cake and then let my daughter play with them. They are far too large for a cake. She'll love playing with them though.
customer_reviews.author: E_To_The_G

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent toy for the money. If your very young child adores care bears, this toy for you, because toddlers prone to forget their favorites pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chubby little bath squirters. Bought as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Chubby little bath squirters. Bought as a gift for a 1 year old. Package says 3+ but I think these will work. They're about 3" tall.
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Cute water toy.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these to play with in water. Made well and cute. Came in on time. No small parts, but not for babies. To me For ages 3 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gange

customer_reviews.title: One year old grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for one year old granddaughters bath time. He just loves it. Perfect size for the bath.
customer_reviews.author: History Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves the Care Bears, and these bath squirters are no exception. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffnix

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly spot on.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. What I expected, what I wanted! Will be an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 6 month old. I won't put them in the tub since we are using them for teether toys. Super cute and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and the color hasnt worn or scratched at all
customer_reviews.author: Glowoman

customer_reviews.title: Size size. Nice feel. Kid approved.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wouldn’t put them down. Nice size and nice feel too!
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. They were bigger then I was expecting. Love them and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: ATubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my daughter she loves them nice value for the money
customer_reviews.author: m summers

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves care bears and this was a one of a kind find for her. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lahneman

customer_reviews.title: Care Bears!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 6 month old to play with. She can easily grip them and hold onto them. They are the perfect size! They are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kimama Bangsi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - very large!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy for the price. They are much larger than expected and of very quality material. They hold a LOT of water and my daughter loves playing with them in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: She was very happy
customer_reviews.text: Brought these and the Care bear as a gift for my granddaughter’s 1st birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is very inferior. It is cheaply made and accumulates dirt inside. I don’t feel that this is safe for babies. Product also arrived opened and used.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L

customer_reviews.title: Great value, larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way larger than you expect, shirt water well. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kya Saner

customer_reviews.title: a nice big size and shipped really quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, a nice big size and shipped really quickly. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to use them in the tub
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use these in the bath I let my daughter play with them outside the tub. She lovrs them! Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Juanchos Girl

customer_reviews.title: but she's super happy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! Typical bath toys, but she's super happy!
customer_reviews.author: M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers. Very cute. Can be played with in or out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute that we leave them out for all day play instead of the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It came late even tho I have amazon prime but very cute for babies !!
customer_reviews.author: Aminta Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a very nice size for bath play time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my 3 yr old granddaughter who loves Care Bears and enjoys her bath time with all of her squirt toys.
customer_reviews.author: MemeDeb

customer_reviews.title: It makes bath time fun!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the squirt toys. It makes bath time fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lois M. Scoskie

customer_reviews.title: These bath toys are great! my LO loves them and plays with them ...
customer_reviews.text: These bath toys are great! my LO loves them and plays with them in and out of the tub. She didn't really know of Care Bears before I got her these but now that she has them she has been really in to watching the show and wants more Care Bear things.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Hughes

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old LOVES these! They are nice and soft! She plays with them in her room tho not in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: JesusLovesYou!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So adorable. My grand loves it. The colors are beautiful and bright. Received in lightning speed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I dont even use them in the bath
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something different for a 2nd child, whos older sibling has a lot of toys. Great size for my 1yo. Small enough to hold, big enough to not choke on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bears!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second set. Super cute. Using one for bath and one to play. Well made, nice size
customer_reviews.author: Terriermom

product_meta.title: Just Play Care Bears Bath Squirters Toy (3 Pack)
product_meta.description: ​Now you can take your Care Bears in the bath. These colorful squirters make bath time so much fun. Includes: Cheer, Share, and Grumpy Bear
feature_bullets: ​Now you can take your Care Bears in the bath. These colorful squirters make bath time so much fun. Includes: Cheer, Share, and Grumpy Bear
